summary: This document appears to be a confidential grand jury material page listing counts, dates, and charges against Jeffrey Epstein. It details multiple charges including conspiracy to entice a minor to engage in prostitution, enticement of a minor, and travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct, spanning from 2004 to 2005.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as the defendant on multiple counts including conspiracy to entice a minor to engage in prostitution, enticement of a minor, and travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct.

events.title: Initial Conspiracy Charge
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with conspiracy to entice a minor to engage in prostitution (O.A. 35).

events.title: Additional Conspiracy Charge
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with another count of conspiracy to entice a minor to engage in prostitution (O.A. 78).

events.title: Enticement of a Minor Charge
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with enticement of a minor to engage in prostitution (Ct. 16), with the charge spanning to 2005-05-27.

events.title: Travel for Illicit Sexual Conduct Charge
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct (Ct. 26).

events.title: Travel for Illicit Sexual Conduct Charge
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct (Ct. 27).

events.title: Travel for Illicit Sexual Conduct Charge
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct (Ct. 34).

events.title: Travel for Illicit Sexual Conduct Charge
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct (Ct. 35).

events.title: Travel for Illicit Sexual Conduct Charge
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct (Ct. 40).

events.title: Recruiting/Enticing a Minor Charge
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is charged with recruiting, enticing, providing, or obtaining a person, knowing she is a minor and will be caused to engage in a commercial sex act (Ct. 58), with the charge spanning to 2005-05-27.

keyFacts: The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL GRAND JURY MATERIAL' and references 'JANE DOE #13', indicating it pertains to grand jury proceedings involving a minor victim.
Jeffrey Epstein faced multiple federal charges from 2004 to 2005, including conspiracy to entice a minor to engage in prostitution and travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct.
The charges span specific dates from August 2004 to May 2005, suggesting a pattern of alleged criminal activity during that period.
The document lists at least eight distinct counts (O.A. 35, O.A. 78, Ct. 16, Ct. 26, Ct. 27, Ct. 34, Ct. 35, Ct. 40, Ct. 58) against Epstein, showing the breadth of the initial federal investigation.
